articles.author: Jonathan Hinckley
articles.title: Mpox: nothing learned from COVID-19 | Science & Technology | World - In Defence of Marxism
articles.description: A new strain of Mpox is tearing through Central Africa. Since the start of the year, 13 African countries have reported more than 22,800 Mpox cases and 622 deaths, which represents a 160 percent increase compared with the same period in 2023. This is likely o…
